      • configureHandlers

        public void configureHandlers()
                       throws Exception
        Set up the handler structure to receive a webapp. Also put in a DefaultHandler so we get a nice page than a 404 if we hit the root and the webapp's context isn't at root.
        Throws:
        Exception
